qa.name: Wise Oak
qa.appearance: Massive oak with a face-like pattern in its bark

json_to_edit.voice_over: Through millennia, I have watched them grow, adapt, and evolve.
json_to_edit.description: An ancient oak tree observes human evolution across different time periods.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Wind rustling leaves, animal sounds, evolving human noises
json_to_edit.name: Tree of Time
json_to_edit.scene_summary: A sentient oak tree witnesses the progression of human evolution over thousands of years.

qa.action: A vast, primordial forest with the Wise Oak at its center, surrounded by untouched nature.

hf.action: The Wise Oak's bark shifts to form a face-like pattern, its 'eyes' opening to observe.

tr.action: A group of Homo Erectus individuals gather near the Wise Oak, crafting simple tools.

xc.action: A curious Homo Erectus approaches the Wise Oak, touching its bark with wonder.

ka.action: The seasons rapidly change around the Wise Oak, showing the passage of time.

fn.action: Neanderthals set up a temporary camp near the Wise Oak, using more advanced tools.

af.action: A Neanderthal's face illuminated by firelight, showing more human-like features.

qo.action: The camera moves from the Wise Oak to reveal a changing landscape, with early human settlements visible.

fp.action: A group of modern humans having a picnic near the Wise Oak, using smartphones and modern equipment.

va.action: The Wise Oak's 'eye' closes, a single leaf falling to symbolize the passage of time.

edit_command: Remove every third shot from the scene, but don't change anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: Through millennia, I have watched them grow, adapt, and evolve.
updated_json.description: An ancient oak tree observes human evolution across different time periods.
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Wind rustling leaves, animal sounds, evolving human noises
updated_json.name: Tree of Time
updated_json.scene_summary: A sentient oak tree witnesses the progression of human evolution over thousands of years.

xc.action: A curious Homo Erectus approaches the Wise Oak, touching its bark with wonder.

label.rationale: we will remove every third shot from the scene as requested, while keeping all other elements unchanged. this means we'll remove shots with keys "tr", "ka", "af", and "va" from the "shots" dictionary. we'll also update the "list_display_order" to reflect these removals. the "number_of_shots" will be reduced from 10 to 6. all other aspects of the scene, including the voice over, description, location, lighting, weather, ambience sound keywords, name, and scene summary will remain the same.
